info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 14 at 9:59PM EDT until June 15 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
FFWLWX
The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Orange County in central Virginia... North Central Spotsylvania County in central Virginia... Culpeper County in northern Virginia... South Central Fauquier County in northern Virginia... West Central Stafford County in northern Virginia... East Central Madison County in northwestern Virginia...
* Until 100 AM EDT.
* At 959 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Culpeper... Madison... Brightwood... Remington... Stevensburg... Raccoon Ford... Brandy Station... Winston... Lignum... Burr Hill... Elkwood... Catalpa... Alanthus... Mitchells... Cardova... Flat Run... Lake Of The Woods... Richardsville... Sumerduck... Fordsville...
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 1:00 AM EDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 1:00 AM EDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Culpeper, VA; Fauquier, VA; Madison, VA; Orange, VA; Spotsylvania, VA; Stafford, VA

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 1:00 AM EDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 1:00 AM EDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Culpeper, VA; Fauquier, VA; Madison, VA; Orange, VA; Spotsylvania, VA; Stafford, VA
